Html:
Hi,

I have the following scenario I can't figure out how to do this with NAudio...

I have 16 mono wave files that are read from the harddisk and streamed to channels 1-16 of a sound module. At the same time I need to mix these 16 channels together (Mono) and stream the mix to the monitor out (headphone out) of the sound module.

I have suceeded in doing one OR the the other, thus either streaming to the 16 outputs OR streaming the mix, but not both...

Whats the best way to do this?
